Level

It's not enough just to make good music. It is imperative to present your creativity to the audience correctly. Marketing skills increase the effectiveness of social action, thereby making it easier to get a high level of hype
Marketing
Good management skills are essential if you need to organize something. For example, organize a concert or negotiate a feat or battle with a famous artist
Management

They are greeted by clothes. Charisma is very important and affects any action of the character. An artist with high charisma is more likely to succeed than an artist without her, even if the second track is technically better
Charisma
The rhythm and fluidity of the rap read. The way the rapper hits the beat or creates extra vibe and dynamics with his reading. Good flow is not maximum, but correct reading speed
Flow
Being able to write a really good beat yourself is very important. A cool beat guarantees half the success of the track, and the words for such a beat sometimes find themselves
Bitmaking

Words are every rapper's weapon. The size of your vocabulary is much more important than the size of your house, car, and bank account. The higher this skill, the more interesting and varied your texts come out in tracks and battles
Vocabulary
A popular dance that began with BlocBoy JB & Drake's «Look Alive» video. It spread all over the world and preceded the next viral challenge
A dance movement where the dancer simultaneously drops his head while raising his arm to the elbow in a gesture similar to that of a sneeze
A response to a round of an opponent in a battle in order to justify or counterattack. A good flip should smash an opponent's arguments or respond wittily to a complaint
A laconic phrase or line that should hook your opponent very strongly. As in boxing, opponents deliver crushing blows, so in battles, the main blow is the punch line
Improvisation, composing rhymed text on the go. This is not a pre-written, not rehearsed, but a raw form of hip-hop
Verbal references to friends and family to convey good wishes
Reference in the text of a track or battle to this or that event, or the mention of a person
Any action doubled. In hip-hop, the word is used when a rapper starts reading over a beat twice as fast as he read before
As if random shouts or words diluting the main text. They sound noticeably quieter than the main track, or at the same volume level, and are recorded as backing vocals
A computer program designed to eliminate singer errors during recording

EXP:
Charity
Improves the quality of tracks, features, albums and clips by <color=#00F475>{0}%</color>
Expensive and very beautiful good. Needed to highlight your coolness and authority!
Money

Why do rappers need money? Obviously to live beautifully! You earn money from your activities: when you release <color=#00F475>tracks</color>, <color=#00F475>albums</color>, shoot <color=#00F475>clips</color> and give <color=#00F475>concerts</color>. Some <color=#00F475>unexpected events</color> in your life can also bring one-time income. The more fans you have, the more money your activity brings! The money can be spent on buying property in the <color=#00F475>store</color>, on <color=#00F475>salaries</color> to your team members, as well as making a <color=#00F475>donation</color> to increase the level of <color=#00F475>hype</color>
Fans

Armies of fans are what you create for. The more fans you have, the more <color=#00F475>tracks</color> listens, <color=#00F475>clip</color> views, <color=#00F475>concerts</color> visits you get. And these numbers directly affect the <color=#00F475>income</color> from your activities. Good deeds and good performance <color=#00F475>have a positive</color> effect on fan growth, while bad deeds and low quality crafts can <color=#00F475>alienate</color> fans from you. Also, with prolonged creative idleness, fans <color=#00F475>forget</color> you and <color=#00F475>leave</color>. Therefore, you must always be in the public eye!
Hype

Hype is a very dynamic characteristic associated with the <color=#00F475>interest</color> of the public in your person. The higher the hype level, the more <color=#00F475>active</color> your fans are: they listen more to <color=#00F475>tracks</color>, watch more <color=#00F475>clips</color> and more eagerly come to <color=#00F475>concerts</color>. The weak side of the hype is that it <color=#00F475>passes very quickly</color>, so you constantly have to <color=#00F475>maintain</color> at a high level with various actions: activity in <color=#00F475>social networks</color>, victories in <color=#00F475>battles</color> or defiant behavior in <color=#00F475>life situations</color>
It's an old «Ford» that's seen a lot. Drives slow, breaks down a lot. Probably more trouble than it's worth
A high-mileage «Lincoln», but in good condition. Real style!
Expensive and high quality «Toyota», in excellent condition. This is a dream car!
Fabulously expensive and luxurious «TESLA»! It has everything you need and more!
A cheap battery watch from «1000 Little Things»
Simple but solid mechanical watch
Expensive watch «CAZIO» in a gold frame and with a gold strap
Luxury watch «Roflex», in a diamond setting and in gold of the highest standard
A cheap silver chain from a nearby pawnshop
Medium gold chain from «CAESAR» jewelry store
Expensive gold chain of the highest standard from the private workshop «GOLD ICE»
Unbelievably expensive custom made gold and diamond chain for you
Cheap grills from the online store «Lali ExPress»
Inexpensive gemstone substitute grills
Gold grillz with diamonds of the «RAFF CAT» brand
Dazzling grillz made of gold of the highest standard with diamonds «KING»
No information about trends
Last known
Actual trends
There is nothing new under the moon

You really like one popular song and you literally listen to it on repeat. And suddenly an idea comes to you: what if you take a beat from a song for yourself? It is perfect for a new track, it couldn't be better!
You take this beat as a basis and make a quality remix in your own way. Someone liked your remix even more than the original!

You didn't even try to change something and absolutely everyone noticed the plagiarism. Violent discussions and exposure of theft began on the Internet. Especially impressionable fans are disappointed, but your talk rate has only increased!
You decide that it is shameful and unworthy to steal other people's ideas. Therefore, it is better to do something of your own, even if not so catchy, but original.
Warm up interest
Everyone knows that before the release of a new track, it is better to whet the public interest. But how? Performance, scandal, interview? There are many options, for every taste and color
You start a live broadcast in EYEGRAM. Answer fan questions, tell cool stories, and cryptically mention the upcoming release. It worked great, fans are impatient!

Like a whirlwind, you fly into the comments of your competitor's broadcast and strike up a skirmish with him and his fans! Even if you showed yourself not on your best side, the Internet is now on the ears and all because of you!
You are lazily posting on EAGLER and a small number of people are now waiting for the release. What do you want?
Show demo

You recorded a new track and sent it to your friends in the general chat for evaluation. Instead of the expected praise for your work, the guys began to point out the shortcomings. Does the track have any flaws?
You understand that objective criticism is useful and listen to advice. The track turned out even better than it was!

You start arguing with your friends and it comes to a personal quarrel. To show your independence, you do the exact opposite and only spoil the track. Perhaps you should sometimes listen to your loved ones?

You are indifferent to advice and criticism, you leave everything as it was and publish the song. It's just too lazy to redo something. Who loves your work will appreciate it. Judging by the reviews, it turns out that way, but perhaps some advice was worth listening to...
Shameless thief

A brilliant idea for a track and a clip comes to you. She's so good that you can't keep the idea to yourself and tell your friend about it. He discusses and praises your idea with great enthusiasm. After some time, you will find out with horror that this friend recently posted a clip in which your idea was copied cleanly!

You contact the thief in personal correspondence and ask for an explanation. In response, he says that he liked your idea so much that he simply could not fail to implement it, and he did not tell you for fear of wasting time on arguments. As compensation, he added you to the video as the author of the idea

You record an angry video message in which you expose the thief by showing a recent correspondence. In response, the insolent person only mocks and mocks you. The advantage is clearly not on your side, you look like an offended child
You ignored this ugly act. Ultimately, you still didn't intend to bring this idea to life.
Politics everywhere

A girl from the mayor's administration contacts you and offers to record a song in support of the mayor of the city for a large reward. The money is not small, but your support is not sincere and can deceive gullible fans. It's a hard moral choice

You agree to the terms of the offer. Firstly, you are a person of art and it is naive to listen to your advice in politics, and secondly, the money is really good Many fans are furious, but you made good money!
You flatly refused to speak out in support of the mayor for money and posted your correspondence with the girl in EYEGRAM to show the fans your incorruptibility. Many of them love it!

You tried to covertly praise the mayor and not fall on your face in front of sensitive fans. Many still understood everything and got even more angry. In addition to accusations of corruption and hypocrisy, you were paid only half of the fee for non-obvious praise
The price of the issue

The beat, the text, it all came together, and you already feel how this hit will tear the industry apart. You are a genius and you are guaranteed a ton of new fans. It remains only to choose a recording studio. There are many options, prices are different everywhere. Is it worth it to waste time on the record of a hit?

You decide to save money and record in a newly opened small studio. Yes, perhaps their equipment is not so modern, but the retro shades gave the track their own special sound. There is something in this. You are satisfied with the result

You cannot save on ingenious tracks. They deserve only the best sound. You are recording in the most expensive studio in the city. This is your best decision lately. The recording is breaking out, but the quality is so cool that you never stop listening to the track. Now you're pretty sure it's a hit

Who needs all these studios? You are reminded of an old friend who records your track in his garage and doesn't even take a dime for it. It turned out not at all what you expected. You may have saved some money, but the track is now definitely not a hit
Give some noise?

Listening to the recording of your new track, you notice extraneous noise, and in general the sound quality does not correspond to your level. Fans are waiting for this track like manna from heaven. The release is already scheduled for tomorrow. Maybe no one will notice a small marriage?

You cannot disappoint the people who have been looking forward to your track. After canceling all the cases, you rush to the studio to have time to finish it today. The release takes place on the appointed date. The fans are thrilled. One sleepless night was worth it

Your buddy is having a party tonight. You plan to get on it and have a good rest. You have neither the time nor the desire to redo the track. You decide to leave it as it is. The track was released on time, but everyone is constantly discussing that it is simply impossible to listen to it because of the frankly bad sound

You already have plans for today, and you don't want to cancel them at all. You decide to record a video message about the postponement of the release date and finalize the track in the near future. The fans are a little upset, but they could understand you. All of them are in anticipation of the long-awaited track
Text with meaning

The text you have worked hard on for three months is finally ready. You put your whole soul into it. Each phrase reflects the depth of everything that you have long wanted to say to your listeners. But it is not possible to decide on the bit. I want to record the track as soon as possible. What should be the beat?

You decide to try to create the beat yourself, because the lyrics are so personal that only you can figure out which style is most suitable for its sound. It turns out pretty well. You yourself did not expect to cope with such a task. Fans appreciated your work
You find a great beatmaker. It understands what you want from the track and creates a beat that blends perfectly with the lyrics. It seems that now you will work together more than once

You download a bit from the site. Probably, it was already used for recording tracks, but you absolutely do not care about that, because the most important thing is the text, and, in your opinion, it turned out to be excellent. The beat turned out to be so jaded and so bad that fans couldn't get into the lyrics of your track
MC Dog

You released a track in which you spoke unflatteringly about MC Dog. In your opinion, he's a lousy performer who shouldn't have started rapping at all. In response, MC Dog inflates this situation to incredible proportions. He insults you and your creativity on every corner. Obviously, the conflict cannot be avoided. What will be your reaction?

You decide to meet MC Dog and settle the conflict peacefully. At the meeting, you get to know each other better and understand that you shouldn't have offended him in your track. MC Dog turned out to be an adequate guy. You discuss with interest each other's creativity, your mistakes and the further path of development in the industry. You are pleasantly surprised by the outcome of the meeting. Maybe someday you will be friends

You know that the surest way to resolve a conflict is to resolve it by force. On the appointed day, you wait for it in a vacant lot near the city. You are determined and not going to give up slack. After two hours of waiting, you realize that MC Dog will not come. He just got scared of you, and now you won't hear a single bad word about yourself from his lips

You absolutely do not care what this underperformer says there. You do not consider it necessary to pay attention to his words. The dog barks - the caravan moves on. Very soon everyone forgets about your conflict
Difficult audience

Your fans have not heard the track you released last week. Many say that you are no longer the same, that you have written out, and your further creativity will only get worse. Everyone has their ups and downs. Haters are just waiting for your reaction. Is it worth paying such attention at all?

You are writing a post on social media. networks, in which you talk about haters, baseless condemnation and unfounded criticism. You encourage people to look around them and get busy with their lives, start doing something, and not condemn others for their inaction. The post gets a lot of likes and comments. Many subscribers support you

You are recording a video message in which you insult your audience in every possible way. You don't care about her opinion. You create your tracks only for yourself and you do not care what stupid people think there who do not understand music and are not able to appreciate real talent. Your appeal is gaining a huge number of views. People hate you and at the same time consider you their idol. The popularity of the tracks is growing. Scandalous reputation small price to pay for it

You ignore all this and keep releasing your tracks. Haters are not lagging behind, but the number of fans is growing. You are invited to various shows in which you only laugh at the haters and express gratitude to them for the growth in popularity
Unpleasant turn

A buddy from the studio calls you over to discuss the details of the recording of the fit you recently worked on. He tells you that another artist used his part of the track to humiliate you and make you look bad. You listen to the track and are horrified at how they could have set you up without revealing everything now. You definitely need to do something about this!

You completely remove the lyrics of another artist and write your own instead. In it, you scoff at the idea of tricking you, reveal all the details of this dirty game and explain why the fit did not take place. Fans are once again shocked and are discussing this situation with might and main. Another artist's reputation is badly tarnished

You leave the text of another artist, but change yours. In it, you make fun of your opponent and his desire to surpass you. Your text comes out so juicy and bold that the text of another artist simply fades against his background. Everyone is discussing your fit. The fans are divided into two camps. Fit brings you great popularity

The situation is not at all pleasant. You don't need unnecessary conversations. You refuse to release a fit without explaining the reasons and do not give any comments on this matter. Rumors of your indifference to creativity and your commitment to other people are starting to spread among fans. Someone even ascribes star fever to you
Creative suspended animation

After a tough tour, you haven't released anything for a long time. Fans want something new from you. There is one track in stock for such a case. But it seems to you that he is not good enough. You are not eager to release anything now, much less this track, but how long can fans wait?

You release a track. As you thought, it turned out to be mediocre and did not bring new fans. Fans appreciated your efforts to please them even after a tough tour. They are confident that as soon as you rest and gain strength, be sure to release another hit

You release a track. Despite your expectations, it blows up the music scene and hits the first places in the charts. Your track sounds from every car passing by. You catch a wave of inspiration and write a few more hits. Your post-tour fatigue goes away as if it never existed

You do not release anything and completely devote your time to rest. This affects your popularity. Part of the audience forgets you, but loyal fans are waiting for your return. Rest is good for you. Now you can create again
Difficulties of cooperation

You recorded a great fit two weeks ago. You expected good results from this collaboration. But the performer who participated in the recording is against his release. The track is great and it would be a big mistake not to release it. Is it worth making mistakes?

After long explanations of all the pros and cons, and clear evidence that everyone will only benefit from the release of this track, the performer agrees to release a fit. Another hit in your pocket. The popularity is growing. And the performer thanks you for the success and hopes that you will have more synergies with him

You know for sure that this track will be listened to by millions. Losing fame because of someone's wishes is simply stupid. You post a fit on your page, and it instantly spreads across the network. A wave of hate pours down on another performer. He is furious and threatens to sue you. Many will now think twice before agreeing to fit with you

You only release your part of the track. Yes, even if it did not thunder as much as the fit would have thundered, but it is better than not to release anything at all. The fans were clearly delighted. The performer thanks you for your understanding and promises to definitely record a cool fit. But you hardly want it anymore
Society for the Protection of Cats

The new track that you recorded should definitely become a hit, but there is one thing. The Society for the Protection of Cats can get to the bottom of some phrases and misinterpret your message. While this is very unlikely, you should be careful and think carefully. Do we go without mentioning cats?

You thought it over well and removed all the lines with the mention of cats, replacing them with others. The track has not lost anything, but has become even better. Fans are enjoying your track. Society for the Protection of Cats Can Sleep Well

You decide to take a chance and leave it as it is. After all, your message is extremely positive. The Society for the Protection of Cats is delighted with the track. They are sure that he will help popularize the theme of cats among the modern generation. You are invited to become the face of the Cat Protection Society. This kind of PR is to your liking

Lazily and indecisively, somewhere you remove phrases about cats, somewhere you leave. From all this, an indistinct porridge of words is obtained. The topic could not be disclosed. Fans practically did not pay attention to this track, and the Society for the Protection of Cats even more so
Unseen circumstances

The roof of the studio where you were going to record the track was leaking. Some of the equipment was damaged and now it is impossible to make a high-quality recording there. The studio apologizes to you, returns the money and gives you the number of another place in which you can record the track just as well. You are very upset and have been holding back your emotions. Or maybe you don't need to restrain them?

You pull yourself together and are in complete control of your emotions. You call the place that you were advised and politely explain the situation to them. It turns out that the owners of these two studios are partners, so, as an apology for the inconvenience, they give you a good discount on the recording of the track. You were satisfied with the sound quality and a pleasant price

You are terribly angry about this situation. The recording had to be in this particular studio. All your plans went down the drain. You cannot contain your emotions and control yourself. You are unable to adequately and without hysteria explain the current situation of the other studio. As a result, you are denied entry, explaining that all the seats are occupied on the date you need. Maybe you should have been quieter?

You are too upset to find and work with another studio. You are recording a track with a buddy. He has good equipment at home, so the sound of the track did not suffer too much. But you saved your nerves, time and money
Lost laptop

During your next flight, you were in such a hurry to get out of the plane one of the first that you forgot your work laptop with all the preparations for the new album. A week later, an unknown person contacted you, said that he had your laptop and asked for a reward for your nobility
You agreed and paid the stranger, but he kept his word and sent your laptop by courier delivery. Yet the time spent is worth much more

You wrote to a stranger that he would not receive a dime and sent him to hell. In response, he leaked all your unreleased demos to the Internet. Some fans were upset with the low quality of the tracks, while the other part, on the contrary, was delighted with something new!
You ignored his message and bought a new laptop. Let everything have to be done from the very beginning, but the conversation with extortionists is short
Story background
A good album is not just a collection of tracks united under one title. A good album is a whole story that the author wants to tell his audience. What story are you going to tell?

You write a long post on social media in which you tell your fans a very personal story from your past, something sacred that you have experienced and that you have not shared with anyone before. The story that inspired the album

You tried so hard to come up with a super-cool story that you clearly overdid it. Even a small child will not believe in such blatant nonsense. Shootout with the cops? Showdown between mafias? Bank robberies? It seems you have replayed GTA V
You tell nondescript stories from your childhood. About how they ran in the yard, kicked the ball, ate soup. They are really very boring
Ambiguous cover

A familiar artist painted a provocative cover. On the one hand, this is an extremely hilarious caricature of the present time, on the other, it is an offensive mockery that can cause ambiguous feelings in people of certain views
You asked for other versions of the cover, more neutral and harmless. They may not be so funny, but in our time it is better not to offend anyone

Provocation is the driving force behind popularity! You are asking to make it even brighter and more defiant. As a result, a big scandal flares up in various communities, but most importantly, what is said about your album from every microwave!
You release the cover album as it is. Someone liked it, some didn't, you can't please everyone
Album promotion
The album is almost ready! It remains only to stir up the interest of the public. Thousands of options, but which one is correct?
You rent a small space and arrange a gathering of the most loyal fans. It turns out to be a very warm and pleasant evening surrounded by people who adore you
You rent a couple of expensive cars, inflatable pools, huge speakers and arrange a crazy ride right through the city! It's hard to miss such an action!
You are lazily making an announcement on the EAGLER social network. The result is poor
Pirate Merch
Shortly before the release of the album, some crooks organized a pre-order of records with your autograph. Unprecedented arrogance!

You find the contact of the scammers and offer to actually sign records for all pre-orders for half of the sales proceeds. The guys turned out to be normal and, after thinking a little, agreed. As a result, no one is deceived and everyone won
You start trumpeting on all social networks that they are scammers. Unwillingly, you strongly advertise liars and more and more people find out about their existence and fall for deception
You don't pay attention to them ... and nothing terrible happens
The cover dilemma

You can't decide on the cover for the new album. Will it be a provocative photo or a striking drawing? In what style is it better to arrange everything? You don't know the answers to these questions yet. But you know for sure that the cover should be catchy and interesting

You contact a local artist whose work you really like. He agrees to paint a picture specifically for your cover. It turns out that your creativity is also to his liking. You couldn't have dreamed of more

You are arranging for yourself an unusual photo session. In it, you try on different images, which ultimately add up to a single puzzle. The photos are incredibly creative. The cover will definitely stand out!
You download a cover image from the Internet. The album came out great, but the artwork could clearly have been done much better
Conceptual music

The idea of creating a concept album has been with you for a long time. You have decided on the theme and even stocked up with a couple of tracks. You have everything to work on an album, except the confidence that the listeners really need it. Are they ready for this kind of creativity?

You are releasing an album. In it, each track seems to continue the previous one, and you manage to tell a whole story with your characters. Fans compare this album to a good movie or play. They hope you don't stop there

You are not sure if the listeners are ready for such turns. You are releasing an album in which only three tracks are conceptually linked. Your audience didn't even notice this connection, but the album as a whole was received very well. You seem to have outgrown your audience
You are sure the audience is not ready for this yet. You are releasing an album in a familiar style. The listeners love you for this sound. Who knows if you will ever dare to do something more?
Album of the Year
Your album is claiming first place in the Best Album of the Year category. Ordinary listeners choose the winner via SMS voting. You really want to win! Maybe you should somehow influence the results?

Participation rules do not prohibit campaigning for your listeners. You take advantage of this and remind your audience on every occasion to remember to actively vote for you. The army of your fans is quite impressive and it is bearing fruit. You become the winner of the “Best Album of the Year” category!

Any means are good for victory. You not only agitate your audience, but also decide to resort to prohibited methods. You are actively voting for yourself from other numbers. According to the results of the vote, you are winning by a suspiciously large margin. The management of the award verifies the results and learns about the fraud. You are deprived of the status of the winner with a scandal! Who could have known that everything would be revealed?

If you are destined to win, then you win effortlessly. You do not advertise your participation in the nomination anywhere. Turns out your fans aren't that savvy about music awards. You haven't won Best Album of the Year
New album presentation

You are thinking about giving an album presentation at your next performance. Nobody knows about the new album yet, and you have no idea how the audience will take this presentation. Maybe it's better to warn everyone in advance?

You decided to play it safe and record a video message in which you talk about the upcoming presentation. Performance tickets are instantly sold out. The hall is packed and the presentation of the album is going well

You decide to arrange a surprise for your listeners. During the performance, you announce that you are presenting your new album to the audience in the hall right now. The crowd is shocked, the audience is overwhelmed with emotions. The presentation is more than successful. The next day, everyone is talking about your album

Why put in so much effort? You can just perform, and in a couple of days to announce the release of a new album. This is what you do. Your career would be useful for bright events, but, apparently, and so it will come down
Distribution of duties

You are so comfortable working on tracks with MC Dog that you decide to record an entire album together. The audience approved of this idea. It remains only to decide how the work on the album will go

Each of you puts an equal amount of effort into writing the album. You listen to each other, discuss your ideas. As a result, you have a great album coming out, and cooperation only brings pleasant impressions

You are in complete control of the entire process. Your MC pressure makes the Dog uncomfortable and unable to produce good material. You didn't let him open up at all. MC Dog refuses to release this album. All the work was wasted
Twenty percent of the action yields eighty percent of the result! Most of the work on the album MC Dog takes over, and you carelessly enjoy the process. It would always be like this!
Live album

While watching your performance, the thought comes to your mind about how cool it would be to record your own live album. It seems to you that such an album will delight people who, for some reason, cannot get to your concert and feel its atmosphere. When is your next gig there?

You yourself record your live album. By carefully checking the sound quality, you end up with a good product. Of course, this cannot be compared with a live performance, but it turned out atmospheric. The audience appreciated your message. They like your attention

You hire the coolest sound engineer in town and record your live album. The sound is so high quality that many listeners have the feeling of being present at the concert here and now. Your fans are thrilled! Especially those who are often unable to attend performances

You trust the recording of a live album to a friend and let everything go by itself. The sound quality is so bad that everyone thought it was a pirated recording and not your album. Someone should better implement their ideas
Copyright

You are being contacted by an aspiring director who wants to use several tracks from your album in a new film. You consider this album to be one of the best in your work. And these tracks have long been loved by your audience. Do you need such a PR?
You gladly agree. The film comes out non-standard and interesting. Film critics write good reviews. The box office doesn't pass you by. You get good money and new listeners to boot.

An aspiring director doesn't inspire confidence in you. You very rudely refuse him, hinting that your creativity is above all this. The film turns out to be successful. The tracks that sounded in it are gaining popularity. You just have to bite your elbows

You don't think it will help develop your creativity. You promise to contact the director later. And then you just ignore his messages and calls. Do you think that after this someone will want to work with you?
Fan reward
You recently ran a contest where your followers helped to come up with a title for your new album. You have already definitely decided on the winner. But what will be his reward?
You indicate the author of the title directly on the album cover and send him a record with your autograph. The subscriber is happy, because you shared with him a piece of your fame

You arrange a personal meeting with the winner, shoot it on video and post it on your page. The winner did not expect such an award and cannot contain his emotions. You had a great time and your followers increased
You give the winner some money to the phone balance. The subscriber is disappointed, he clearly expected something more. Was this all the brainstorming for?
Legendary sand
Your listeners are bored. You want to entertain your audience and stream your album live. But how is it worth it?

You cleverly find a common language with the audience. Everything is going very warmly and positively. This format turned out to be to everyone's liking and will be remembered for a long time by your fans

You put on a whole show from this broadcast, which comes out rather strange, but attracts a lot of audience attention. You've got a bunch of views. They talk about you in both positive and negative ways. But the main thing is what is being discussed, and how exactly is not important!
You are recording your stream so despondently that people simply turn off your broadcast. The views are very small, and it is better not even to read the comments. You could have tried better
Purchased talent

The rumor is actively spreading on the Internet that your new album was written not by you, but by someone else. The audience doesn't recognize your style at all, but you know the truth. Simple experiments and nothing more. The whole album is your handiwork, is it worth making excuses?

You post a video in which you talk about finding yourself in creativity. You share your experiences, attempts to find new themes and sounds. Your followers finally realize that you are just trying new things. The rumor that the new album was not written by you now looks just ridiculous and ceases to be relevant

You write an angry post in which you make complete fools of your subscribers. You are not trying to make excuses, you are simply insulting your audience, which is not worthy of your creativity, since they believed in all these rumors. Such a violent reaction makes listeners even more suspicious that all this is true, and you really did not write the album yourself
Let them think what they want. It's easier to ignore it. You are honest with yourself and don't see the point in making excuses. People will always find something to complain about
Not on my shift!
The police arrived on the set. People living in nearby houses complained about the noise. Filming in jeopardy, what to do?

You politely explain to the police that a new video is being filmed. It turned out that one of the police officers knows you. They offer filming assistance. Now you have a real police car in your video!
You are trying to intimidate the police with your «big connections». You are taken to the station and given a fine. Filming is disrupted and the release date of the clip will have to be postponed
You meet the police politely, promise not to make noise and not turn on loud music. The police draw up a protocol and leave. Filming continues, but much more accurately
Prostration
The shooting has been going on for many hours and one person from the crowd becomes ill. Filming stops. What is your reaction?
You refuse to help this person. Your kindness does not go unnoticed and is later actively discussed on social networks
You are angry and urgently demand to replace the person. Such a trick smells like star fever and hardly anyone will like it
You go to your dressing room and indifferently wait for the person to be brought to their senses
Little spies
Schoolchildren climbed onto the set and secretly captured the process of filming the video on their phone. They're going to put these tapes online!
Attempts to come to an agreement with the children do not end with anything, they merge the recordings of the filming into the network. But nothing bad happens!
What could be worse than an idol who is furious with you? The frightened children delete the recordings, and the video continues
Spit, let them spread it! To the surprise of many fans, it was interesting to see how art is going on
Money makes money
Your agent insists on leaving to fill the clip with advertising and make good money. But what about creativity?
You agree with the agent and half of the clip is driving a taxi, drinking soda and eating convenience foods. The clip is more like a commercial break on TV
You flatly refuse advertising and take all expenses from the filming of the video on yourself. Having learned about your act, the audience appreciated the video even better!
You agree to take part of the advertisement in the clip. Hungry poets need something to eat, right?
A - agitation
You are offered to devote a clip of campaigning to certain politicians. And offer good rewards
You are not good at politics, but you are great at money, and therefore you agree. However, among your audience there were many people who do not take politics as easily as you do
You flatly refuse such an offer. You are a person of art, not an agitator, so you do not speak out on the topic of politics. Regardless of their political views, most people agree with you

You are trying to find a compromise, constantly dodging between the demands of the contract and the feelings of the fans. As a result, the negotiations ended in nothing, and another rapper, who received a sea of hate, agreed to campaign. You are, we can say, lucky!
Drunk operator

The cameraman for your video came to the set drunk. You have been negotiating the lease of this location for a month. Reschedule shooting is not an option. You understand that the operator is unlikely to be able to do his job. What should be done?

You call your friend who makes good videos. He, of course, is not a professional, but in this situation there is no choice. Your friend is taking a good shot. The clip looks a little amateurish, but viewers thought you shot it in this style on purpose

You are furious! How could this be allowed? You tell the operator what you think of him and threaten to tell everyone about his negligent attitude to work. He fearfully dials someone on the phone, and after 10 minutes another operator appears on the set. The video turned out even better than you expected

After all, you've already paid the operator the money. Let him work out his shift. He shoots your video and all his shots can only be called marriage. The work of so many people is down the drain. Did you really think something would come of this?
Director's Cut

You have found a great director and want to work on the video with him. As you discuss ideas, you realize that you see the end result in completely different ways. His other videos certainly impress you, but should you give him free rein?
You let the director realize his ideas, while not forgetting about your own. The clip comes out exactly as you imagined it. You and the director were happy with the result

Everything should be just the way you want it. You discard all the director's ideas and leave only yours. Most of them are so delusional that the director refuses to film it. It seems that you will have to look for someone to shoot again
The director knows best how to do it. Let everything be as he says. You get a good clip, but something is missing. Maybe your involvement?
Wounded souls

Activists of the “Cacti and Llamas” movement saw in your video elements of insult to the feelings of lamas. You are sure that nothing of the kind is there. Everything can end in a loud scandal. Need to destroy the clip and apologize?

You just have to defend your plan. You clearly lay out the whole idea of your video on the shelves and convince everyone that there is no offending the feelings of the lamas in it. You do it so confidently that the activists of «Cactus and Llama» are left with no arguments. The audience does not doubt that you are right.

You decide to play around with this situation. Let everyone wonder what you mean. Nobody will wait for an explanation, let alone an apology. The scandal is still in the air. Great, because this is another reason to remind you of yourself.
You silently delete the clip from all platforms without trying to defend your position. Maybe there really were insults to the feelings of the lamas? Now no one will remember
In search of paradise

To shoot the video, you need to fly to the Valley of Five Lakes. This is a very picturesque place. You are sure that there will be breathtaking footage. It's quite a long flight, and it won't be cheap. Is the game worth the candle?

You think for a long time and decide to look for something else. One evening of searching, and you find a place as good as the Valley of Five Lakes. It is ideal for filming a music video. The flight there will cost several times cheaper, and the shots will be excellent

You have already submitted all the frames of your clip there. Let's fly to the Valley of Five Lakes! Yes, you will not have any funds left for further development in the near future. But you are sure that this clip will bring many times more than you spend
We will remove everything outside the city and you will not have to fly anywhere. The lake there is not so picturesque and there is only one, but after all, you do not pretend to much either
Non-punctual actress
The actress who stars in your video is very late for filming and won't pick up the phone. You cannot wait any longer. Obviously, you have to work with what is
The supporting actress was able to replace her. She handled this role well. It took longer to work on your scene together than you planned, but the result was decent

The director's assistant looks great for the lead role. But can she do it? It's worth the risk! You persuade the assistant to replace the actress. She easily copes with the role, and in the frame she looks just awesome
You take on the main role of the first actress you come across from the crowd. She doesn't fit at all and plays very badly. You should have paid more attention to your choice
Hunger riot
The food you ordered for the crew hasn't been delivered in over an hour. People worked six hours. They are hungry and get angry. You yourself would love to have a snack. What to do?

You go to the nearest supermarket and pick up a bunch of all kinds of food. You apologize to all the crew members. They greedily devour everything that you brought and are no longer angry with you at all
You promise that after filming you will take everyone to the nearest restaurant at your own expense. The film crew immediately cheered up. The shooting may end even faster than you planned
You keep waiting for your order. It is brought in only three hours later. The film crew is very unhappy. But, as an apology, you were given three pizzas as a gift
Food poisoning

Before shooting the video, you obviously ate something wrong. Your whole face is covered with red spots. An hour is left before filming, and you do not know at all what to do. Who would have thought that tomato pudding would have such an effect on you?
You run to the pharmacy for allergy pills. The pharmacist advises you on a good drug. In half an hour, you are fully in shape, and the shooting of the video is successful

You understand that you can't do without makeup. You ask your make-up artist to experiment and make you a makeup that matches the style of the video. In the frame, your face looks shocking. The clip will clearly be remembered by the audience
You cannot act like this. Nothing good will come of it. The best solution would be to move the shooting. Next time, be careful with tomato pudding
Logistic error

You are filming a video in the genre of science fiction. The whole location is like a large spaceship. It looks impressive. You just need to wait for the costumes and you can start filming. A few minutes later, the rest of the props are brought to the set. Instead of fancy costumes, you have been sent baroque clothes. You realize with horror that this is not your props. How to shoot a video now?
You call the studio and explain the whole situation with the props. They are already aware of the misunderstanding that occurred. Suitable suits were sent to you and delivered in half an hour

An idea comes to your mind to slightly change the concept of filming. A few plot adjustments, and you get an eccentric clip, where fiction and baroque are mixed together. You never thought it would come out so great
Casual clothes are fine. All members of the video remain in their clothes. It looks terribly ridiculous and completely ruins the concept of the video. How did this come to your mind?
Fan art

They shot a parody of your video and posted it online. The parody received a lot of views and even became more successful than the original. You are filled with mixed feelings. On the one hand, it turned out to be really funny and cool, but on the other hand, it does not leave the feeling that they are simply making fun of you. What is the best way to respond?

This is the best you've ever seen! You react positively to this parody and even post it on your page. Subscribers appreciated your self-irony and left many enthusiastic comments. The author of the parody also left a comment under the publication. He is glad that he did not offend you, but, on the contrary, managed to make you laugh

This is the most ridiculous and stupid mockery! You get angry and throw mud at the parody author on all social networks. Subscribers don't understand your reaction. Most of them find the parody very funny and completely offensive. Now everyone thinks you're too arrogant
Well, filmed and filmed. You absolutely do not care about this. Let them do what they want, and you will continue to do your work
Bad clip

The clip you have been working on for a long time has been hailed on the net. You don't understand what the matter is. Excellent script, cool director, gorgeous picture. What did the audience lack? You are very upset, although you hide it well. You need to distract yourself from bad thoughts and relieve tension. What is the best way to do this?

Solitude with nature is what you need. You go out of town for a couple of days. There you walk in the woods, breathe fresh air and even meditate by the reservoir. After such a reboot, you are ready to conquer new heights.

Music and dancing will make you feel good again. You collect all your friends and throw a noisy foam party. You haven't had so much fun for a long time. People began to disperse only in the morning. Everyone will remember this party for a long time
Stress can always be overwhelmed. You order yourself a lot of fast food and sit comfortably in your chair in front of the TV. The next day, you feel terrible. Why overeat so much?
Greedy landlord
An hour before the start of the concert, the owner of the room comes up to you, asks you to be understanding and demands to increase the rent
You agree to the terms of the cunning arena owner and the concert takes place as usual
You refuse such impudence, announce the return of tickets and give a mini-concert on the roof of the car near the entrance. It seems that those who did not return the tickets were delighted!
You instruct your agent to figure it out. He argues for a long time with the owner of the arena and, as a result, ensures that the contract does not change.
Light up the lights
During the concert, the lights are turned off throughout the room. Someone is positive, and someone starts to panic. What to do?
You ask the audience to take out their phones and light their flashlights, and then continue the concert without a microphone. The crowd sang along with you, it came out very atmospheric!
You freak out and leave the stage. What was the rent paid for? You are demanding compensation and the fans feel abandoned
You chat with the fans in the front row until the electricity is repaired, then you continue the concert as usual. The people in the back rows did not have much fun
Impudent fan girl
Right in the middle of the concert, a hot girl from the audience jumps out onto the stage, yelling excerpts from the song and trying to hug you. Where are the guards looking!?
Together with the girl, you sing her favorite song of yours and leave an autograph right on her hand. It seems this is the best day of her life!
You shout to the guards to immediately drag the girl off the stage. Many in the audience did not like it, mostly the guys. Other girls seem to be happy on the contrary

From surprise, you abruptly cut off the performance. There is an awkward pause and people from the crowd start screaming for the girl to leave as soon as possible. She blushes and leaves the stage confused and empty
Like a rock star
The concert is in full swing, the crowd is reaching out to you! Is she waiting for the jump?
You run and jump! Dozens of hands support you, roll you a little and push you back onto the stage
You rip off your shirt and water the crowd with water from a bottle. It's fun too!
You have heard many cases when a jumper or a person in a crowd was injured. You definitely don't need this
Relieve tension
Your band's musicians offer you a drink before the show to relieve tension
You knock over a couple of glasses with the musicians and give an inspiring toast. Excessive tension really goes away and not a drop of excitement remains on the stage!
You resent such negligence and forbid guys like that. As a result, the disappointed band plays without enthusiasm and the concert goes sluggishly
You refuse yourself, but do not interfere with the guys. Let them be a little fake on stage, but don't get nervous
Daring provocateur

From the very beginning of the concert, the guy from the front row shows you obscene gestures, makes grimaces and shouts offensive insults. He clearly wants to piss you off and is trying very hard. And for this he bought an expensive ticket?

In the intervals between songs, you personally address the provocateur - hold out the microphone and invite you to speak in front of everyone. The guy is clearly being overwhelmed, his courage has abruptly disappeared somewhere

At some point, you can't stand it, you drop the microphone and throw yourself at the provocateur with your fists. Scared female screams and male exclamations are heard. Someone is happy with the show, someone is shocked by what is happening. The guards separate you and take the offender out of the hall, the concert continues
Throughout the concert, you diligently ignore the unpleasant character, without ever looking into his eyes. The provocateur will never know if his efforts were worth some results
VIP fans

Today's concert was successful. You signed a bunch of autographs and took pictures with everyone. Now you can have a good rest. You go to the dressing room to get your things and see a huge line of fans at the door. They tell you that they bought VIP tickets and are waiting for you here to spend time together. You don't know anything about any VIP tickets. What's going on here?

People are not to blame for being deceived. You are holding a fan meeting. Then you go to the organizer and ask for an explanation. He comes up with a stupid excuse, confusedly says something about scammers, but you understand everything. You will tell everyone about this incident and put it in the worst possible light. The organizer has no choice but to give you the proceeds from the sale of VIP tickets and save your reputation

How can you agree to something you didn't know about? You give up hanging out with your fans. People are angry, demanding a refund for tickets. This is none of your business. Let the organizer who arranged it all figure it out

Apparently, you just forgot about it. You are having a great time with your fans and you can relax now. It seems that everything was as it should have been. But why does the organizer of the concert smile so slyly?
This is also a job

The concert is coming to an end. It's time to start signing autographs and taking pictures with fans. You are not feeling well, and your only desire is to be in bed with a cup of hot tea in your hands. The fans are waiting. What to do?

You announce to your fans that you will not be able to do an autograph session due to poor health. You apologize and leave the stage. The fans were upset, but they saw that you were really not feeling well and were able to understand you
You are doing an autograph session. Everyone got an autograph and a photo as a souvenir. And now you have to lie down at home for a couple of days to recover. But the fans were satisfied

You end your speech. People are waiting for an autograph session, and you have already escaped through the back door without giving any reason. The fans are upset, no one expected this from you. Is your illness a stellar one?
Mad fan girl
An inadequate fan has sneaked into your backstage. She behaves like crazy and won't let you on stage. The whole team is already there. The audience is just waiting for you. How to elude her?

You calmly and kindly tell her that you really have to go on stage. You promise to spend time with her after the show. Your tone inspires confidence in her, she calms down and lets you go. You are certainly not going to date her. It is necessary to inform the organizers about this

You pretend to share her feelings and invite her to go on stage together. She, of course, agrees. As soon as you appear on the stage, immediately take the microphone in your hand and publicly ask the organizers to remove this crazy woman from the stage. The fan is taken away. You should strengthen your security

You can't know exactly what she can throw out. You scream at the top of your lungs and call for help. She throws herself at you and tries to cut your hair. Your security arrived in time. Now you need to come to your senses and start performing
Music Festival

You are taking part in a music festival. It's your turn to perform. You and your team check your equipment and realize that you forgot your laptop charger. I don't want him to sit down right during the performance. Your exit in 10 minutes. How to perform now?

You decide to ask other participants of the festival for exercises. Maybe there is something suitable? Good luck is on your side! One of the participants has the same laptop. He is happy to give you a charge. Now your performance is safe

You decide to amuse people and chat with them while your sound engineer buys a new charger at the nearest store. The crowd loves your initiative. The soundman returns quickly and you start your performance
Let's hope the laptop doesn't run out of power. The show is short-lived and it might work. Everything goes smoothly. You successfully complete your presentation. This is luck!
Technical difficulites
During the performance, your microphone starts to fail. The sound engineer is already looking for a new one for you, but for now you need to somehow defuse the situation. How?
You start dancing and invite the audience to join until the microphone is replaced. People repeat your movements, they have fun and that's the main thing. The flash mob was successful

You try to talk to people as loudly as possible and invite them to sing along. The whole audience begins to sing along with you. It turns out atmospheric, but. you seem to have lost your voice a little
You are trying to continue your performance. Half of your words are incomprehensible. People start buzzing with displeasure. Hurry to bring you a new microphone
Unbridled slam
At the performance, to your track, they start to slap. Everything looks harmless at first, but then it gets out of control. Viewers can get hurt if you don't do anything. Are you going to just watch?
You smoothly transition to a more lyrical and slower track. The slam slowly stops by itself. After the track, you ask the fans to act reasonably. They seem to have heard you

You turn the audience's attention to yourself and ask them to sing along with you. Then you throw a bunch of T-shirts with your logo into the gym. And then you promise to throw off your cap if everyone behaves well. Fans now have no time for slam, because at any moment your cap can fly into the hall. Well thought out

They want and laugh. You continue to play the track. Not without injuries. Someone even broke their nose. The next day, a video of your concert is distributed over the network. Most people perceived negatively your inaction. Many people think you don't care about your fans
A few words back and forth

You just finished your corporate talk and are going home. Suddenly, two drunk guys come up to you and imposingly ask you to say a few words for them on camera. Obviously, they will not just lag behind. How to be?

You pretend to agree to shoot and ask for a couple of minutes. You go to the event organizer, explain the situation and ask them to distract the guys until you leave. The organizer agrees, and you go home with peace of mind

You are trying to explain that you have already completed your presentation and that such things are not included in it. The guys clearly don't want to understand you. Word for word and you get into a fight. It's good that the organizers quickly stole you away. You got off with a couple of bruises, but it could be worse
It's not difficult for you at all. A couple of minutes and the video is ready. One of the guys pats you on the shoulder and thanks you. Now you can go home
Accidental injury

During concerts, you sometimes throw small presents off the stage. This time, you fired a small bottle of water into the hall and hit some guy in the eye. Unpleasant situation. Is it worth reacting somehow?
You ask forgiveness and ask if everything is all right. Fortunately, everything worked out, and the audience is pleased with your attention. The concert continues. You should still be careful

You are wondering if everything is all right. It looks like nothing serious, but there will definitely be a bruise. Need to cheer up the guy. You invite him to the stage and perform his favorite track together. You made him a little happier
You continue speaking as if nothing had happened. The guy left in frustrated feelings. The audience is whispering among themselves. Many did not understand your behavior, and some even left
Delayed flight

Your flight was delayed by six hours, and now you are late for your own concert. You will go straight from the plane to the performance, the journey will take about an hour, but you still will not make it in time. What's the audience to do for an hour?

The opening guys have to handle it. You call them and ask them to stay for an additional fee. They try very hard to keep the room, but everyone demands you. Finally, you appear on stage. The audience is jubilant! They have been waiting for you for a very long time

You decide to connect with viewers online and ask them to display the broadcast on the screen in the audience. You communicate with the crowd via video link, laugh it off and even try to perform tracks with them. The hour passed quickly. Perfect solution!

What can you do? We can only hope that we will be able to get there faster. The organizers were able to explain everything to the audience. The concert is going well. But the public was left with a sludge from such a long wait

The gameplay is very simple - record tracks, albums, shoot music videos and hold concerts. All these activities bring <color=#00F475>experience</color>, new <color=#00F475>fans</color> and <color=#00F475>money</color>.
For <color=#00F475>experience</color>, you can pump up your character to increase the quality of new creations. With <color=#00F475>money</color> you can buy items in the store, which affect both the quality of new works and the constant level of <color=#00F475>hype</color>.
Depending on the number of <color=#00F475>fans</color>, you will get more listens and views, and consequently more <color=#00F475>money</color>.
Enjoy the game!

The character page shows your current <color=#00F475>progress</color>.
Here you can find information about the <color=#00F475>things</color> you've bought, see <color=#00F475>stats</color> and <color=#00F475>skills</color> of your character, find out the <color=#00F475>popular track</color> and remember <color=#00F475>last actions</color>

The success of a track depends on several components. 
First, on <color=#00F475>quality</color>. Quality depends on the <color=#00F475>skills</color> of your character, his team (Beatmaker and Gostwriter) and <color=#00F475>equipment</color> (microphone, soundcard, etc).
Second, from the level of <color=#00F475>hype</color>. The higher the hype before the track is released, the more people will listen to it, so it's important to prepare for the track's release in advance.
Thirdly, from being in line with <color=#00F475>trends</color>, so it's important to keep an eye on what's trending right now.
With a certain probability the track can go <color=#00F475>viral</color> and a lot more people will listen to it
The success of an album is very similar in its mechanics to the success of a <color=#00F475>track</color>, except that it takes longer to work on an album

The success of a music video depends on the <color=#00F475>quality of work</color> of your character and his team (Producer and Cameraman), on the level of <color=#00F475>hype</color> and on the <color=#00F475>success of the track</color> on which the video is shot.
Therefore, it is much more profitable to shoot music videos for very successful, <color=#00F475>viral</color> tracks

The success of a concert is highly dependent on the <color=#00F475>success of the album</color>. The more popular the album is, the more people will come to the concert. But if you give concerts with the same albums, people will quickly <color=#00F475>get bored</color> and stop coming.
Also, the concert depends on the quality of <color=#00F475>organizational work</color> of your character and his team (Manager and PR-agent), the level of <color=#00F475>hype</color> and <color=#00F475>ticket price</color>. The more expensive the ticket, the fewer people will want to buy it

Here you can choose one of the social activities: make a <color=#00F475>post</color> on social media or a public <color=#00F475>charitable donation</color>.
Each of the activities temporarily increases the <color=#00F475>hype</color> level
This is a <color=#00F475>Eagler</color> social media feed where you can post your thoughts and your fans can give their impressions of your work

Here you can pump your <color=#00F475>stats</color>. The higher the stats level, the more <color=#00F475>work points</color> your character will produce when creating a track, album, music video, organizing a concert, during a fit or battle, or when being active on social networks

Here you can unlock new <color=#00F475>skills</color>. Different skills come in handy in different situations. Some are useful when you're recording a track or performing at a concert, some when you're in a battle with another rapper

Here you can discover new <color=#00F475>styles</color> and <color=#00F475>themes</color> for tracks and albums. They will help to diversify your creativity and better match <color=#00F475>trends</color>

Here you can manage your <color=#00F475>team</color>. It is very important to pump up their <color=#00F475>stats</color> so that they produce more work points and help improve the quality of your actions, as well as pay them <color=#00F475>wages</color>, because without wages no one will work

This page presents <color=#00F475>popular rappers</color> with whom your character can interact: offer to record a <color=#00F475>fit</color> or host a <color=#00F475>battle</color>. Your <color=#00F475>manager</color> is responsible for organizing the talks.
Also, you can <color=#00F475>add</color> your favorite rappers and interact with them
This is the <color=#00F475>activity history</color> page of your peronage. Here you can remember the ups and downs, and <color=#00F475>post nostalgia...</color>
This is your <color=#00F475>email</color>. This is where you receive various letters and notifications. Don't forget to check your email so you don't miss anything important!
On this page you can read current <color=#00F475>news</color> and find out what interesting things are happening in the world at the moment
Legend

Congratulations!
You managed to reach <color=#00F475>maximum</color> number of fans and forever write your name in the list of <color=#00F475>legends</color> of world hip-hop! Repeat such a thing is not possible for everyone!
The game does not end here, you can <color=#00F475>continue</color> to create new hits and delight your loyal fans or try to <color=#00F475>repeat</color> your success.
Enjoy the game!

Universal Music Group N.V. (often abbreviated as UMG and referred to as just Universal Music) is a Dutch–American multinational music corporation under Dutch law. UMG's corporate headquarters are located in Hilversum, Netherlands and its operational headquarters are located in Santa Monica, California. The biggest music company in the world, it is one of the Big Three record labels, along with Sony Music and Warner Music Group

Sony Music Entertainment, is an American multinational music company owned by Sony Entertainment and managed by the American umbrella division of multinational conglomerate Sony. It is the recording division of the Sony Music Group, with the other half being the publishing division, Sony Music Publishing

Warner Music Group, commonly abbreviated as WMG, is an American multinational entertainment and record label conglomerate headquartered in New York City. It is one of the Big Three recording companies and the third-largest in the global music industry, after Universal Music Group (UMG) and Sony Music Entertainment (SME)

Atlantic Records is an American record label founded in October 1947 by Ahmet Ertegun and Herb Abramson. Over the course of two decades, starting from the release of its first recordings in January 1948, Atlantic earned a reputation as one of the most important American labels, specializing in jazz, R&B, and soul by Aretha Franklin, Ray Charles, Wilson Pickett, Sam and Dave, Ruth Brown and Otis Redding

Capitol Records is an American record label owned by Universal Music Group through its Capitol Music Group imprint. It was founded as the first West Coast-based record label of note in the United States in 1942 by Johnny Mercer, Buddy DeSylva, and Glenn E. Wallichs. Capitol was acquired by British music conglomerate EMI as its North American subsidiary in 1955
Def Jam is an American multinational record label owned by Universal Music Group. It is based in Manhattan, New York City, specializing predominantly in hip hop, contemporary R&B, soul and pop

Interscope Records is an American record label based in Santa Monica, California, owned by Universal Music Group through its Interscope Geffen A&M imprint. Founded in late 1990 by Jimmy Iovine and Ted Field as a $20 million joint venture with Atlantic Records of Warner Music Group and Interscope Communications

RCA Records is an American record label owned by Sony Music Entertainment, a subsidiary of Sony Corporation of America. RCA Records is one of Sony Music's four flagship labels, alongside RCA's former long-time rival Columbia Records; also Arista Records, and Epic Records. The label has released multiple genres of music, including pop, classical, rock, hip hop, afrobeat, electronic, R&B, blues, jazz, and country

Columbia Records is an American record label owned by Sony Music Entertainment, a subsidiary of Sony Corporation of America, the North American division of Japanese conglomerate Sony. It was founded on January 15, 1889, evolving from the American Graphophone Company, the successor to the Volta Graphophone Company. Columbia is the oldest surviving brand name in the recorded sound business, and the second major company to produce records.

Republic Records is an American record label owned by Universal Music Group (UMG). Based in New York City, it was founded by Avery Lipman and Monte Lipman as an independent label in 1995, and was acquired by UMG in 2000. Republic was initially an imprint of the Universal/Motown Records Group, and was renamed Universal Republic Records after a reorganization in 2006 before going back to its original name in 2012

Epic Records is an American record label owned by Sony Music Entertainment, a subsidiary of Sony Corporation of America, the North American division of Japanese conglomerate Sony. The label was founded predominantly as a jazz and classical music label in 1953, but later expanded its scope to include a more diverse range of genres, including pop, R&B, rock, and hip hop

Sub Pop is a record label founded in 1986 by Bruce Pavitt and Jonathan Poneman. Sub Pop achieved fame in the early 1990s for signing Seattle bands such as Nirvana, Soundgarden, and Mudhoney, central players in the grunge movement. They are often credited with helping popularize grunge music

Merge Records is an independent record label based in Durham, North Carolina. It was founded in 1989 by Laura Ballance and Mac McCaughan. It began as an outlet for music from their band Superchunk and music created by friends, and has expanded to include artists from around the world, with records reaching the top of the Billboard music charts

Domino is a British independent record label based in London. There is also a wing of the label based in Brooklyn, New York that handles releases in the United States, as well as a German division called Domino Deutschland and a French division called Domino France. In addition, Stephen Pastel presides over the subsidiary label Geographic Music, which releases more 'unusual' music from Britain and outside of the Western world

XL Recordings is a British independent record label founded in 1989 by Tim Palmer and Nick Halkes. It has been run and co-owned by Richard Russell since 1996. It forms part of the Beggars Group. The label releases albums worldwide and operates across a range of genres

4AD is a British record label owned by Beggars Group. It was founded in London under the name Axis by Ivo Watts-Russell and Peter Kent in 1980 as an imprint of Beggars Banquet Records. The name was changed to 4AD after the release of the label's first four singles. Later that year, Watts-Russell and Kent purchased the label from Beggars Banquet to become an independent record label, and Kent sold his share to Watts-Russell a year later

Warp Records (or simply Warp) is a British independent record label founded in Sheffield in 1989 by record store employees Steve Beckett and Rob Mitchell and record producer Robert Gordon. It is currently based in London and in the early 1990s, the label initially became associated with the UK's northern bleep techno scene

Ninja Tune is an English independent record label based in London with a satellite office in Los Angeles. Inspired by a visit to Japan, Matt Black and Jonathan More created Ninja Tune in 1990 as a means to escape the creative control of major labels, and as a vehicle to release music of an underground nature, free from the constraints

Island Records is a Jamaican multinational record label owned by Universal Music Group. It was founded in 1959 by Chris Blackwell, Graeme Goodall, and Leslie Kong in Jamaica, and was eventually sold to PolyGram in 1989. Island and A&M Records, another label recently acquired by PolyGram, were both at the time the largest independent record labels in history

BMG Rights Management GmbH (also known simply as BMG) is an international music company based in Berlin, Germany. It combines the activities of a music publisher and a record label. BMG was founded in October 2008 after Bertelsmann sold its stake in Sony BMG. From 2009 to 2013, the investment firm KKR held 51% of the company, which became one of the world's largest music publishers during that time

This music label emerged in the heart of the music industry, quickly becoming a powerhouse in shaping contemporary musical landscapes. With a diverse roster of talented artists spanning various genres, the label has consistently delivered chart-topping hits and critically acclaimed albums. Known for its innovative approach to artist development and cutting-edge production techniques, it has played a pivotal role in shaping the sound of modern music

The Global Label Ranking is a list in which labels compete for the <color=#00F475>top spots</color>. A label's position is determined by its <color=#00F475>prestige</color> and <color=#00F475>score</color>. A label's score depends on the <color=#00F475>popularity</color> of the artists who have signed with it. Labels are constantly <color=#00F475>trying to sign</color> more and more artists, and those artists have the right to move between labels or to go free, so the current information is constantly being updated

At the moment, you are not under <color=#00F475>contract</color> with any label. As your <color=#00F475>popularity</color> grows, game labels <color=#00F475>will start offering</color> you to sign a contract with them. Also, on this page you will be able to <color=#00F475>create your own label</color> and start developing it

Here you can see information about the label you have signed with. You can see the label's <color=#00F475>other artists</color>, its <color=#00F475>prestige</color> and <color=#00F475>production</color>, as well as the amount of <color=#00F475>commission</color> the label takes from your earnings. <color=#00F475>Production</color> is the label's influence on your work activities (tracks, clips, etc.)

Here you can up label's <color=#00F475>prestige</color> and <color=#00F475>production</color> for your own <color=#00F475>experience points</color>, see <color=#00F475>financial reports</color> and the current <color=#00F475>list of artists</color> on your label. Every month you <color=#00F475>need to pay</color> the expenses of your label - staff salaries, rent, marketing and so on. The higher the prestige of the label, the higher its expenses. If a check is not paid on time, the label is <color=#00F475>frozen</color> until paid and ceases to function. A label's <color=#00F475>income</color> depends on the <color=#00F475>popularity</color> of the artists who have signed with it. The more popular the artist, the more money they bring in to the label. The <color=#00F475>higher</color> the prestige of the label, the more popular artists you can sign
